explains: n. 贫困，匮乏，剥夺；免职（尤指圣职）
wordGroup: sleep deprivation 睡眠剥夺，剥夺睡眠
relative deprivation [社会]相对剥夺；相对性匮乏

sentences.en: They had withstood siege, hunger and deprivation.
sentences.cn: 他们经受了围困、饥饿和贫穷。

sentences.en: Millions more suffer from serious sleep deprivation caused by long work hours.
sentences.cn: 还有数百万人由于工作时数长导致他们严重睡眠不足。

sentences.en: The World Cup is also chiefly responsible for sleep deprivation.
sentences.cn: 世界杯也是造成睡眠不足的主要原因。
